raw_body: WICKRAMASINGHE – BERTRAM TITUS MENDIS,​ (Retired Factory Manager),​ beloved husband of Sunethra,​ loving father of Shiny and Dilranga,​ father-in-law of Randhi and Dushan,​ grandfather of Aken and Shevan,​ brother of Savithri,​ Dr Kantha,​ Asoka and late Ranjith. Remains lie at “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s for viewing on Wednesday,​ 14th from 8.30 a.m. to 10.00 p.m. until the cortege leaves for cremation on Thursday,​ 15th February at 4.00 p.m. at the Main Crematorium of Borella General Cemetery.        010713
